title: Longer Travelling Time on NSL due to Emergency Button Activation

title_translations.zh-Hans: 因紧急按钮激活导致南北线（NSL）行程时间延长
title_translations.ms: Masa Perjalanan Lebih Lama di NSL kerana Pengaktifan Butang Kecemasan
title_translations.ta: அவசரகால பொத்தான் செயல்படுத்தப்பட்டதால் NSL இல் நீண்ட பயண நேரம்

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train services from #Newton towards #JurongEast are now operating normally.
[NSL]: Expect longer travelling time from #Woodlands towards #AngMoKio due to emergency button activation by customer at #Woodlands.
[NSL]: Expect longer travelling time from #DhobyGhaut towards #MarinaBay due to emergency button activation by customer at #DhobyGhaut.
